data.what_is:
Ryzeo helps ecommerce companies increase revenues. Based in California, Ryzeo was spunoff from StreamSend in late 2017 with the mission of using helping increase revenues for ecommerce clients.

With Ryzeo Browse Abandonment will Turn Window Shoppers into Buyers by converting shoppers that haven't even added products to their carts with Browse Abandonment. Results in 4x more conversions than Cart Abandonment. ROI is Guaranteed.

Key Features:
Welcome Series
Cart Abandonment
Product Upsell Email
Post-Purchase Email
Newsletter Email
Nurture Email
Email CRM
Ecommerce Dashboard
Subscription Forms
Responsive Emails
Site Tracking

Automation Goals
Smart Messaging
Integrations:
Magento
Custom Carts
Magento
Miva
BigCommerce
3D Cart
Shopify
Volusion
X-Cart
Able Commerce
WooCommerce
SparkPay
OSCommerce
OpenCart
Zen Cart
Woo Commerce
Suite Commerce Advance
OS Commerce
N/A
K-eCommerce
Freestyle Solutions
FDM4


Keywords:
Cart abandonment 
email marketing software
Email marketing platform
Ecommerce dashboard
Behavioral automation
email segmentation
dynamic content
responsive emails
cart integration
conversion tracking
split testing
data.product_description: Ryzeo is a full service behavioral marketing solution provider, helping Ecommerce companies turn more of their hard earned traffic to revenue through predictive, automated, one-to-one email messages.

initial_reviews.review_content:
What do you like best about Ryzeo?
The Ryzeo team are sensitive to the needs of my business, and I can get a hold of them easily whenever I need anything.

What do you dislike about Ryzeo?
I've got no complaints. Everything works as advertised.

What problems is Ryzeo solving and how is that benefiting you?
I use Ryzeo for both automated and traditional email marketing.

review_question_answers.question: What do you like best about Ryzeo?
review_question_answers.answer: The Ryzeo team are sensitive to the needs of my business, and I can get a hold of them easily whenever I need anything.

review_question_answers.question: What do you dislike about Ryzeo?
review_question_answers.answer: I've got no complaints. Everything works as advertised.

review_question_answers.question: What problems is Ryzeo solving and how is that benefiting you?
review_question_answers.answer: I use Ryzeo for both automated and traditional email marketing.

initial_reviews.review_content:
What do you like best about Ryzeo?
Ryzeo and their team have helped us overhaul our marketing and outreach to our clients. Cart abandonment, search/category capture, and welcome emails are just the tip of the iceberg. Their system is helping drive sales to our site and a regular basis.

What do you dislike about Ryzeo?
We are so early in the process that we have no dislikes so far. Everything has been as advertised, and the team is always available for a meeting or call to discuss any issues we have. We have no problems here.

What problems is Ryzeo solving and how is that benefiting you?
Our main problem is capturing clients when they are on our site, whether in the cart or just while searching. The benefits are capturing lost income due to a client forgetting, getting distracted, or just having an issue on the site. The email marketing system helps remind customers and guide them back to our site to complete a purchase or search.

review_question_answers.question: What do you like best about Ryzeo?
review_question_answers.answer: Ryzeo and their team have helped us overhaul our marketing and outreach to our clients. Cart abandonment, search/category capture, and welcome emails are just the tip of the iceberg. Their system is helping drive sales to our site and a regular basis.

review_question_answers.question: What do you dislike about Ryzeo?
review_question_answers.answer: We are so early in the process that we have no dislikes so far. Everything has been as advertised, and the team is always available for a meeting or call to discuss any issues we have. We have no problems here.

review_question_answers.question: What problems is Ryzeo solving and how is that benefiting you?
review_question_answers.answer: Our main problem is capturing clients when they are on our site, whether in the cart or just while searching. The benefits are capturing lost income due to a client forgetting, getting distracted, or just having an issue on the site. The email marketing system helps remind customers and guide them back to our site to complete a purchase or search.

initial_reviews.review_content:
What do you like best about Ryzeo?
I have been charting our sales conversions from Ryzeo campaigns for over three years and I am happy with the results. The Welcome Series alone is above a 5 to 1 ROI, and the overall conversion revenue has steadily grown since signing with Ryzeo. The latest figures account for about 30% of our e-commerce sales and about 10% of our total sales.
I would recommend using Ryzeo's email marketing service for anyone looking to increase their internet revenue.

What do you dislike about Ryzeo?
I don't have anything that I dislike about the service.

What problems is Ryzeo solving and how is that benefiting you?
Our first foray into e-commerce marketing was a disaster with a pay-per-click company; literally zero sales. Ryzeo's email marketing was a natural fit for us and our client base. The Ryzeo team helps you walk through the setup and it is easy to use.

review_question_answers.question: What do you like best about Ryzeo?
review_question_answers.answer:
I have been charting our sales conversions from Ryzeo campaigns for over three years and I am happy with the results. The Welcome Series alone is above a 5 to 1 ROI, and the overall conversion revenue has steadily grown since signing with Ryzeo. The latest figures account for about 30% of our e-commerce sales and about 10% of our total sales.
I would recommend using Ryzeo's email marketing service for anyone looking to increase their internet revenue.

review_question_answers.question: What do you dislike about Ryzeo?
review_question_answers.answer: I don't have anything that I dislike about the service.

review_question_answers.question: What problems is Ryzeo solving and how is that benefiting you?
review_question_answers.answer: Our first foray into e-commerce marketing was a disaster with a pay-per-click company; literally zero sales. Ryzeo's email marketing was a natural fit for us and our client base. The Ryzeo team helps you walk through the setup and it is easy to use.

initial_reviews.review_content:
What do you like best about Ryzeo?
Our account manager Drew is very responsive. He emails back very quickly and does things for us in a timely fashion. He is taking time to teach us to do things on our own and Ryzeo seems easy to work with.

What do you dislike about Ryzeo?
As of right now we do not have anything that we really dislike. Everything seems to be working properly and the process for us to send a newsletter does not seem to be hard.

What problems is Ryzeo solving and how is that benefiting you?
We were formally using Streamsend now Ryzeo just for our email marketing. Now we are using them to send our newsletters and it seems to be easier to send our newsletters. I have not seen a great deal of sales increase, it just may be too soon but the email marketing we have seen increase in sales in the past.

review_question_answers.answer: Our account manager Drew is very responsive. He emails back very quickly and does things for us in a timely fashion. He is taking time to teach us to do things on our own and Ryzeo seems easy to work with.

I have not seen a great deal of sales increase, it just may be too soon but the email marketing we have seen increase in sales in the past.

initial_reviews.review_title: Ryzeo has been the perfect partner for WingStuff
initial_reviews.review_content:
What do you like best about Ryzeo?
Everything is so easy with Ryzeo. From communication to design to implementation, the entire process is always stress free.

What do you dislike about Ryzeo?
We have honestly been nothing but happy with everything involving Ryzeo since day one.

Recommendations to others considering Ryzeo:
If you are looking for a great company to help you with email marketing and many other types of email for your business, Ryzeo is honestly the best company we've worked with.

What problems is Ryzeo solving and how is that benefiting you?
We are seeing better open, click throuh and conversion rates with our email marketing then ever before. The addition of abandonment emails to our arsenal has also helped us with saving orders and customer retention tremendously.

initial_reviews.review_title: Simple and efficient email marketing platform
initial_reviews.review_content:
Describe the project or task Ryzeo helped with:
We use Ryzeo mainly for email marketing but for the last few years, have been using their Insights program to engage customers with welcome emails and cart abandonment. It has been showing results every month since we integrated it into our online sales. We also have a screenpopper set up through Ryzeo that allows us to gather email addresses from customers for us to stay in touch.

What do you like best about Ryzeo?
I like how easy it is to create and send emails. Also, importing and adding to email lists is very easy. After the email sends the reporting side shows all of the information we need. The Insights program is what I like best. It has demonstrated results since the beginning and is very easy to maintain. Initial integration was not the easiest thing to do but they help every step of the way.

What do you dislike about Ryzeo?
For the most part everything is awesome. When there were issues, for example, with duplicate emails in some of the reports, the support team was swift in resolving the issue.

Recommendations to others considering Ryzeo:
Highly recommend. As good as other companies out there with lower costs.

What problems is Ryzeo solving and how is that benefiting you?
We are able to reach our customer base easily. We can gather new customer email addresses, even when they are not making purchases. We are able to engage with the customers to "keep them coming back!" :)

review_question_answers.answer: We use Ryzeo mainly for email marketing but for the last few years, have been using their Insights program to engage customers with welcome emails and cart abandonment. It has been showing results every month since we integrated it into our online sales. We also have a screenpopper set up through Ryzeo that allows us to gather email addresses from customers for us to stay in touch.

After the email sends the reporting side shows all of the information we need. The Insights program is what I like best. It has demonstrated results since the beginning and is very easy to maintain. Initial integration was not the easiest thing to do but they help every step of the way.

initial_reviews.review_content:
What do you like best about Ryzeo?
I like how Ryzeo was very simple to learn to use. I know that even with multiple brands everything was able to be toggled between and easily understandable in one place.

What do you dislike about Ryzeo?
I'm not super fond of the Ryzeo website and Screenpopper Website being separated websites. I wish they were on one platform so it'd be easier to remember where everything is (and is easy to remember on one site).

What problems is Ryzeo solving and how is that benefiting you?
Our company is solving email captures with Ryzeo's pop-up notification feature. Additionally, we are tackling all of our automation e-mails to visitors and purchasing customers.

review_question_answers.answer: Our company is solving email captures with Ryzeo's pop-up notification feature. Additionally, we are tackling all of our automation e-mails to visitors and purchasing customers.

initial_reviews.review_content:
What do you like best about Ryzeo?
Their services were very hands-off for us.  They handled everything from conception, to sequence setup, to building of the actual emails and integrating with our eCommerce platform.

What do you dislike about Ryzeo?
No real downsides to working with Ryzeo.

Recommendations to others considering Ryzeo:
Ryzeo is a great tool for those who are looking to go beyond simple cart-abandon emails.  Their behavior-based triggered emails have driven us a great ROI and continue to deliver a great customer experience.

What problems is Ryzeo solving and how is that benefiting you?
We were looking to build targeting email sequences that went beyond simple cart-abandon emails.

initial_reviews.review_title: Ryzeo has helped our company grow
initial_reviews.review_content:
What do you like best about Ryzeo?
Great customer service and fair pricing.

What do you dislike about Ryzeo?
We haven't had any negative experiences and we've been with them for 5 years.

What problems is Ryzeo solving and how is that benefiting you?
Ryzeos automated emails help us retarget customers. Their ESP also allows us to create and send good looking emails of our own.

review_question_answers.question: What problems is Ryzeo solving and how is that benefiting you?
review_question_answers.answer: Ryzeos automated emails help us retarget customers. Their ESP also allows us to create and send good looking emails of our own.

initial_reviews.review_content:
Describe the project or task Ryzeo helped with:
I have used Ryzeo for drip marketing campaigns and cannot say enough good things about them. They are extremely competitive in their pricing and have EXCELLENT customer service.

If you are looking for a place to host email marketing campaigns, after doing quite a bit of research & using Ryzeo for years, I honestly do not believe there is a better option.

What do you like best about Ryzeo?
It's a tie between

1) Ease of use
2) Customer Service
3) Competitive Pricing

What do you dislike about Ryzeo?
In all honesty, there is not one single thing that I can think of that was not up to par.

Recommendations to others considering Ryzeo:
I did extensive comparative research & do believe Ryzeo offers the best option.

What problems is Ryzeo solving and how is that benefiting you?
I needed a place to be able to send out monthly newsletters along with targeted marketing campaigns.

review_question_answers.answer:
I have used Ryzeo for drip marketing campaigns and cannot say enough good things about them. They are extremely competitive in their pricing and have EXCELLENT customer service.

If you are looking for a place to host email marketing campaigns, after doing quite a bit of research & using Ryzeo for years, I honestly do not believe there is a better option.

initial_reviews.review_title: Ryzeo has offered us huge ROI
initial_reviews.review_content:
Describe the project or task Ryzeo helped with:
Screenpopper for abandoned carts, email/newsletters

What do you like best about Ryzeo?
I really like the fact that I have a dedicated account rep. That is HUGE. As a former Account Manager myself, I really appreciate that!

What do you dislike about Ryzeo?
I do wish there were more bells and whistles on the email creation (like constant contact), but overall I'm a very happy customer.

Recommendations to others considering Ryzeo:
n/a

What problems is Ryzeo solving and how is that benefiting you?
Huge ROI on abandoned carts, and the other automatically generated emails creating additional sales and new customers.

initial_reviews.review_content:
Describe the project or task Ryzeo helped with:
Ryzeo has helped us tremendously improve our abandoned shopping cart rate, as well as capturing other users that visit our site that may not have come back to make a pruchase.

What do you like best about Ryzeo?
The system is very easy to use, and your Account Managers help get you set up with very minimal time and effort on the business.

What do you dislike about Ryzeo?
I don't have any issues or dislikes with the service at this time.

What problems is Ryzeo solving and how is that benefiting you?
Targeted emails based upon what the customer is looking for have been a benefit that we did not know we could do in the past. We also didn't have a good system for shopping cart abandonment, and this system has helped us with that issue.

initial_reviews.review_title: Ryzeo - Most likely the most honest and fair email marketing platform.
initial_reviews.review_content:
Describe the project or task Ryzeo helped with:
Ryzeo - had the best and most capable on-boarding I've experienced with a SAAS company. They walk you through and actually do some of the setup for you. They will let you lead with your superior knowledge of what you do - and chip in their expertise in email marketing to make a great mash up of emails that convert.

What do you like best about Ryzeo?
Honest up front pricing and customer service.

What do you dislike about Ryzeo?
Zero Negatives and i've been with them for 3-4-5 years :)

Recommendations to others considering Ryzeo:
Call / email them and see if they can multiply your current successes.

What problems is Ryzeo solving and how is that benefiting you?
Abandoned Cart emails > order flow and great conversion statistics with uber low unsubscribe rates

initial_reviews.review_content:
Describe the project or task Ryzeo helped with:
Ryzeo/Streamsend managed our automated emails for over a year. They created an automated marketing program that promotes products to our customers based on activity.


What do you like best about Ryzeo?
I liked that while we were forced into using this service, we were able to research what we needed to be improved in this facet of marketing. It was a good entry to product marketing.

What do you dislike about Ryzeo?
Ryzeo uses very old interfaces that are very difficult to get anything done in. You'll resort to asking them to manage all aspects of every email since it's impossible to navigate on your own. In fact, they refuse to teach you how to do it yourself.

What problems is Ryzeo solving and how is that benefiting you?
We realized that we weren't utilizing this aspect of our marketing to its potential since we were weighed down by this service.

initial_reviews.review_title: The best revenue-boosting marketing strategy we use!
initial_reviews.review_content:
Describe the project or task Ryzeo helped with:
Ryzeo helped my company create an automated marketing program that promotes products to our customers based on their website activity.

What do you like best about Ryzeo?
I love how easy the set-up process is. The Ryzeo team wrote all our emails for us, with review and feedback provided by our marketing team and did a great job of capturing our brand.

What do you dislike about Ryzeo?
We did have a few technical issues at the beginning of the program, with some customers being sent more emails than they should have. But our Ryzeo support team fixed any problem quickly and were easy to work with.

Recommendations to others considering Ryzeo:
Make sure to communicate any issues that arise while using this program. We did experience some technical issues at launch, but they were all fixed very quickly and without causing any major issues. The support team was very responsive.

review_question_answers.question: Describe the project or task Ryzeo helped with:
review_question_answers.answer: Ryzeo helped my company create an automated marketing program that promotes products to our customers based on their website activity.

review_question_answers.answer: I love how easy the set-up process is. The Ryzeo team wrote all our emails for us, with review and feedback provided by our marketing team and did a great job of capturing our brand.

review_question_answers.question: What do you dislike about Ryzeo?
review_question_answers.answer: We did have a few technical issues at the beginning of the program, with some customers being sent more emails than they should have. But our Ryzeo support team fixed any problem quickly and were easy to work with.

review_question_answers.question: Recommendations to others considering Ryzeo:
review_question_answers.answer: Make sure to communicate any issues that arise while using this program. We did experience some technical issues at launch, but they were all fixed very quickly and without causing any major issues. The support team was very responsive.

all_reviews.review_content:
What do you like best about Ryzeo?
Ryzeo and their team have helped us overhaul our marketing and outreach to our clients. Cart abandonment, search/category capture, and welcome emails are just the tip of the iceberg. Their system is helping drive sales to our site and a regular basis.

What do you dislike about Ryzeo?
We are so early in the process that we have no dislikes so far. Everything has been as advertised, and the team is always available for a meeting or call to discuss any issues we have. We have no problems here.

What problems is Ryzeo solving and how is that benefiting you?
Our main problem is capturing clients when they are on our site, whether in the cart or just while searching. The benefits are capturing lost income due to a client forgetting, getting distracted, or just having an issue on the site. The email marketing system helps remind customers and guide them back to our site to complete a purchase or search.

The email marketing system helps remind customers and guide them back to our site to complete a purchase or search.

all_reviews.review_content:
What do you like best about Ryzeo?
I have been charting our sales conversions from Ryzeo campaigns for over three years and I am happy with the results. The Welcome Series alone is above a 5 to 1 ROI, and the overall conversion revenue has steadily grown since signing with Ryzeo. The latest figures account for about 30% of our e-commerce sales and about 10% of our total sales.
I would recommend using Ryzeo's email marketing service for anyone looking to increase their internet revenue.

What do you dislike about Ryzeo?
I don't have anything that I dislike about the service.

What problems is Ryzeo solving and how is that benefiting you?
Our first foray into e-commerce marketing was a disaster with a pay-per-click company; literally zero sales. Ryzeo's email marketing was a natural fit for us and our client base. The Ryzeo team helps you walk through the setup and it is easy to use.

I would recommend using Ryzeo's email marketing service for anyone looking to increase their internet revenue.

all_reviews.review_content:
What do you like best about Ryzeo?
Our account manager Drew is very responsive. He emails back very quickly and does things for us in a timely fashion. He is taking time to teach us to do things on our own and Ryzeo seems easy to work with.

What do you dislike about Ryzeo?
As of right now we do not have anything that we really dislike. Everything seems to be working properly and the process for us to send a newsletter does not seem to be hard.

What problems is Ryzeo solving and how is that benefiting you?
We were formally using Streamsend now Ryzeo just for our email marketing. Now we are using them to send our newsletters and it seems to be easier to send our newsletters. I have not seen a great deal of sales increase, it just may be too soon but the email marketing we have seen increase in sales in the past.

all_reviews.review_title: Ryzeo has been the perfect partner for WingStuff
all_reviews.review_content:
What do you like best about Ryzeo?
Everything is so easy with Ryzeo. From communication to design to implementation, the entire process is always stress free.

What do you dislike about Ryzeo?
We have honestly been nothing but happy with everything involving Ryzeo since day one.

Recommendations to others considering Ryzeo:
If you are looking for a great company to help you with email marketing and many other types of email for your business, Ryzeo is honestly the best company we've worked with.

What problems is Ryzeo solving and how is that benefiting you?
We are seeing better open, click throuh and conversion rates with our email marketing then ever before. The addition of abandonment emails to our arsenal has also helped us with saving orders and customer retention tremendously.

all_reviews.review_title: Simple and efficient email marketing platform
all_reviews.review_content:
Describe the project or task Ryzeo helped with:
We use Ryzeo mainly for email marketing but for the last few years, have been using their Insights program to engage customers with welcome emails and cart abandonment. It has been showing results every month since we integrated it into our online sales. We also have a screenpopper set up through Ryzeo that allows us to gather email addresses from customers for us to stay in touch.

What do you like best about Ryzeo?
I like how easy it is to create and send emails. Also, importing and adding to email lists is very easy. After the email sends the reporting side shows all of the information we need. The Insights program is what I like best. It has demonstrated results since the beginning and is very easy to maintain. Initial integration was not the easiest thing to do but they help every step of the way.

What do you dislike about Ryzeo?
For the most part everything is awesome. When there were issues, for example, with duplicate emails in some of the reports, the support team was swift in resolving the issue.

Recommendations to others considering Ryzeo:
Highly recommend. As good as other companies out there with lower costs.

What problems is Ryzeo solving and how is that benefiting you?
We are able to reach our customer base easily. We can gather new customer email addresses, even when they are not making purchases. We are able to engage with the customers to "keep them coming back!" :)

It has been showing results every month since we integrated it into our online sales. We also have a screenpopper set up through Ryzeo that allows us to gather email addresses from customers for us to stay in touch.

After the email sends the reporting side shows all of the information we need. The Insights program is what I like best. It has demonstrated results since the beginning and is very easy to maintain. Initial integration was not the easiest thing to do but they help every step of the way.

all_reviews.review_content:
What do you like best about Ryzeo?
I like how Ryzeo was very simple to learn to use. I know that even with multiple brands everything was able to be toggled between and easily understandable in one place.

What do you dislike about Ryzeo?
I'm not super fond of the Ryzeo website and Screenpopper Website being separated websites. I wish they were on one platform so it'd be easier to remember where everything is (and is easy to remember on one site).

What problems is Ryzeo solving and how is that benefiting you?
Our company is solving email captures with Ryzeo's pop-up notification feature. Additionally, we are tackling all of our automation e-mails to visitors and purchasing customers.

all_reviews.review_content:
What do you like best about Ryzeo?
Their services were very hands-off for us.  They handled everything from conception, to sequence setup, to building of the actual emails and integrating with our eCommerce platform.

What do you dislike about Ryzeo?
No real downsides to working with Ryzeo.

Recommendations to others considering Ryzeo:
Ryzeo is a great tool for those who are looking to go beyond simple cart-abandon emails.  Their behavior-based triggered emails have driven us a great ROI and continue to deliver a great customer experience.

What problems is Ryzeo solving and how is that benefiting you?
We were looking to build targeting email sequences that went beyond simple cart-abandon emails.

all_reviews.review_content:
Describe the project or task Ryzeo helped with:
I have used Ryzeo for drip marketing campaigns and cannot say enough good things about them. They are extremely competitive in their pricing and have EXCELLENT customer service.

If you are looking for a place to host email marketing campaigns, after doing quite a bit of research & using Ryzeo for years, I honestly do not believe there is a better option.

What do you like best about Ryzeo?
It's a tie between

1) Ease of use
2) Customer Service
3) Competitive Pricing

What do you dislike about Ryzeo?
In all honesty, there is not one single thing that I can think of that was not up to par.

Recommendations to others considering Ryzeo:
I did extensive comparative research & do believe Ryzeo offers the best option.

What problems is Ryzeo solving and how is that benefiting you?
I needed a place to be able to send out monthly newsletters along with targeted marketing campaigns.

Zero Negatives and i've been with them for 3-4-5 years :)

all_reviews.review_content:
Describe the project or task Ryzeo helped with:
Ryzeo/Streamsend managed our automated emails for over a year. They created an automated marketing program that promotes products to our customers based on activity.


What do you like best about Ryzeo?
I liked that while we were forced into using this service, we were able to research what we needed to be improved in this facet of marketing. It was a good entry to product marketing.

What do you dislike about Ryzeo?
Ryzeo uses very old interfaces that are very difficult to get anything done in. You'll resort to asking them to manage all aspects of every email since it's impossible to navigate on your own. In fact, they refuse to teach you how to do it yourself.

What problems is Ryzeo solving and how is that benefiting you?
We realized that we weren't utilizing this aspect of our marketing to its potential since we were weighed down by this service.

all_reviews.review_title: The best revenue-boosting marketing strategy we use!
all_reviews.review_content:
Describe the project or task Ryzeo helped with:
Ryzeo helped my company create an automated marketing program that promotes products to our customers based on their website activity.

What do you like best about Ryzeo?
I love how easy the set-up process is. The Ryzeo team wrote all our emails for us, with review and feedback provided by our marketing team and did a great job of capturing our brand.

What do you dislike about Ryzeo?
We did have a few technical issues at the beginning of the program, with some customers being sent more emails than they should have. But our Ryzeo support team fixed any problem quickly and were easy to work with.

Recommendations to others considering Ryzeo:
Make sure to communicate any issues that arise while using this program. We did experience some technical issues at launch, but they were all fixed very quickly and without causing any major issues. The support team was very responsive.

review_question_answers.question: What do you dislike about Ryzeo?
review_question_answers.answer: We did have a few technical issues at the beginning of the program, with some customers being sent more emails than they should have. But our Ryzeo support team fixed any problem quickly and were easy to work with.

review_question_answers.question: Recommendations to others considering Ryzeo:
review_question_answers.answer: Make sure to communicate any issues that arise while using this program. We did experience some technical issues at launch, but they were all fixed very quickly and without causing any major issues. The support team was very responsive.
